GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.152 to before v5.4.200
GSD.description:
usb: dwc2: Fix memory leak in dwc2_hcd_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit 6506aff2dc2f7059aa3d45ee2e8639b25e87090f, it was introduced in version v5.4.152 by commit 8b9c1c33e51d0959f2aec573dfbac0ffd3f5c0b7. For more details please see the references link.
